findings.description: CORS misconfiguration allowing arbitrary origins with credentials enabled on WordPress REST API endpoint can allow attackers to read sensitive page data from authenticated users' sessions.
findings.exploitation_steps: Create malicious webpage that makes XHR request to https://www.plex.tv/wp-json/wp/v2/pages/20856 with credentials, which will succeed due to CORS misconfiguration and return potentially sensitive page content to attacker's domain.
